Our Product Range

Standard Thermal Rolls

High-quality thermal paper rolls perfect for POS systems, cash registers, and receipt printers.

  • Various sizes available
  • High print quality
  • Long-lasting prints
  • BPA-free options
  • Competitive pricing

Credit Card Rolls

Specialized thermal rolls designed for credit card terminals and payment processing systems.

  • EMV compliant
  • Secure printing
  • Multiple width options
  • Fade-resistant
  • Quick processing

Label Rolls

Thermal label rolls for shipping, inventory management, and product labeling applications.

  • Strong adhesive
  • Weather resistant
  • Custom sizes
  • Barcode compatible
  • Easy peel backing

Custom Solutions

Tailored thermal paper solutions designed to meet your specific business requirements.

  • Custom printing
  • Branded designs
  • Special coatings
  • Bulk ordering
  • Technical support

About Fulcrum

Fulcrum Thermal Paper Rolls is a premium brand by Sumukha Technology, dedicated to providing high-quality thermal paper solutions for businesses worldwide.

With years of experience in the industry, we understand the critical role that reliable thermal paper plays in your daily operations. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted partner for businesses of all sizes.

From small retail stores to large enterprises, we provide thermal paper rolls that deliver consistent performance, excellent print quality, and long-lasting results.
